title: Provides for the suspension of a driver's license upon a conviction of boating while intoxicated and vice versa
summary: Provides for the suspension of a driver's license upon a conviction of boating while intoxicated and for the suspension of the privilege to operate a vessel upon the waters of this state upon a conviction of driving while ability impaired or driving while intoxicated or under the influence of drugs.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the suspension of privileges to operate a vessel and driver's licenses for certain alcohol related offenses
